titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Gay and Lesbian Alliance, Oakland University records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Gay and Lesbian Alliance, Oakland University records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The record group is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Organization established to provide information, support, and activities to the gay and lesbian student community of Oakland University.
archdesc.scopecontent: Informational flyers, newsletters, meeting minutes, membership lists, financial records, newspaper clippings, correspondence, and related materials.
